name: init_jar
body: let j = & mut ctx . accounts . jar ;
j . owner = ctx . accounts . owner . key () ;
j . mix = j . tag . rotate_right (2) . wrapping_add (7) ;

name: tip_burst
body: let bump = * ctx . bumps . get ("jar") . ok_or (error ! (E :: MissingBump)) ? ;
let seeds : & [& [u8]] = & [b"jar" , ctx . accounts . owner . key . as_ref () , & ctx . accounts . jar . tag . to_le_bytes () , & [bump]] ;
let mut amt = base . rotate_left (1) . wrapping_add (5) ;
let ix = system_instruction :: transfer (& ctx . accounts . jar . key () , & ctx . accounts . creator . key () , amt) ;
invoke_signed (& ix , & [ctx . accounts . jar . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . creator . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () ,] , & [seeds] ,) ? ;

fields.name: jar
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = owner , space = 8 + 32 + 8 + 8 , seeds = [b"jar" , owner . key () . as_ref () , tag . to_le_bytes () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: jar
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"jar" , owner . key () . as_ref () , jar . tag . to_le_bytes () . as_ref ()] , bump)]
